name: Horde (itch) (PixelPorPixel)
description:
In this game inspired by: "King of the Prairie"

by: ConcernedApe (Eric Barone).

Your objective is to pass the 12 stages(more soon), trying as much as possible to survive by picking up power ups (Coming Soon), and dodging the hordes of monsters.

The Game is still in Alpha, but I'm dedicating myself day and night to you guys having the best.

Thanks for playing!
